channel.title: Soulcatcher's Limbo
channel.description:
Soulcatcher should be able to revive since he's a priest converted. But since he's evil and there's a cap on the evil fac members being alive, he should be able to revive **one** person and when he revives them they are put into Limbo where they are until a evil fac member dies. And when the member dies he get revive. But before this is done, soil catcher needs to steal a soul of a good member. So when the evil person is revived they are revived in that good persons spot so after being revived he isn't automatically executed because they known he was evil before.
Thanks.

item.title: Soulcatcher's Limbo
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I made a suggestion liek this.

What I said was each night until they successfully revive, they select an unseen member (maybe even them self) and a dead blue dragon member; if the selected unseen member dies, the blue dragon is resurrected into their unseen conversion.

Prince obv stay prince.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher's Limbo
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Resurrecting someone for the evil side it far too OP no matter what nerf you’re gonna apply to it. They have convert to get more members.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher's Limbo
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
I was thinking this too so I was then thinking maybe it should take time like 2 days for it to fulfill during which time the soul catcher can’t do anything else and if the soulcatcher dies, the resurrection failed or something. Idk I just think it would make sense for the priest’s conversion to be able to resurrect.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulcatcher's Limbo
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
No, the afterlife Limbo but I get the joke. XD.

And also when the unseen member is put into Limbo I think his character should be Teleported to a white void of nothingness until his fate of resurrection is fulfilled.

That would be a pretty cool cosmetic affect imo…

Read full topic
